Texts.chs: 用来解释绘世者动荡的过去
Texts.Eng: A log explaining turbulent past of the Skath.

Texts.chs: 最终，入侵者开始在绘世者的空间里过于深入，最终暴露出了弱点。正是在这个时候，绘世者能够用他们新的等离子武器技术(从入侵部队的技术逆向工程)扭转局势，重获自由。
Texts.Eng: Eventually, the invaders began to stretch themselves too thin in Skath space, and eventually exposed a weakness. It was at this point that the Skath were able to turn the tide with their new Plasmic weapon technology (reverse engineered from that of the invading forces) and reclaim their freedom.

Texts.chs: 我们所知道的绘世者的“历史”只能追溯到两三百年前，那时它就变成了一个非常不同的故事……悲伤和痛苦，奴役和死亡。你看，就在绘世者开始星际探索的时候，他们迫不及待地想和银河系附近的其他人见面。
Texts.Eng: Skath 'history' as we know it goes back only two to three hundred years, at which point it becomes a very different tale...one of sorrow and misery, slavery and death. You see, close to the time they began interstellar exploration the Skath were anxious to meet others in their galactic neighborhood.

Texts.chs: 据说侵略者在恐惧中逃跑，再也没有回来。然而，根据他们的叙述，可以推测，实际上入侵者自己被另一种力量完全消灭了……或者仍然存在于我们之中。如果我的理论是准确的，那么很有可能他们就是Ghex;它们最近被已知空间边缘的Xitix-Thelus吞噬而灭绝。
Texts.Eng: Their stories claim the invaders ran in fear, never to return. Based on their narrative, however, it is surmised that in truth the invaders were themselves eliminated by another force entirely...or are still among us. If my theories are accurate ,the chances are high they were in fact the Ghex; they were recently eaten to extinction by the Xitix-Thelus on the fringes of known space.

Texts.chs: 这种渴望将被证明是愚蠢的，因为与他们最接近的物种(他们称之为Volarian，尽管在目前的记录中没有这种物种的记录)是一种敌对的物种，并且只在绘世者人身上看到了一种新的食物来源。在可怕的机器的帮助下，他们吃饱了。
Texts.Eng: This eagerness would prove folly, for the nearest species to them (whom they refer to as Volarian, though no record of this species exists in current records) was of a hostile sort and saw only a new food source in the Skath people. And feed they did, with the help of their terrible machines.

Texts.chs: 由于无法在技术上与敌对的侵略者竞争，绘世者人在6到9个月内停止了所有的抵抗活动(关于这个细节的记录是零星的)，只能接受了他们的命运。在将近200年的时间里，他们作为食物和奴隶工作，供那些压迫者取乐。
Texts.Eng: Unable to compete technologically with the hostile invaders, the Skath ceased all resistance activity within six to nine months (records are spotty on this detail) and simply accepted their fate. And for almost two hundred years they worked as food and slaves, bred for the enjoyment of their oppressors.

Texts.chs: 在海浪下面，一种不同的抵抗开始了。绘世者的一支大部队已经撤退到敌人无法(或不愿意)到达的大洋和海域，记录中没有指明方向。他们把偷来的技术和自己的技术结合起来，想出了新的抵抗方法。他们现在需要的只是一个出击的机会。
Texts.Eng: Underneath the waves, a different sort of resistance had begun. A large contingent of Skath had retreated into the oceans and seas where the enemy was unable to follow (or unwilling, records do not specify either way). Using stolen technology merged with their own, new methods of resistance were devised. All they needed now was a chance to strike.
